snippet: The clinic, operated by Doctors Without Borders, was hit by airstrikes on Wednesday morning, leaving nine people injured.
abstract: Saudi Arabia-led military coalition forms committee to address accusations it bombed Doctors Without Borders clinic in Yemen, injuring nine people.
lead_paragraph: The clinic, operated by Doctors Without Borders, was hit by airstrikes on Wednesday morning, leaving nine people injured.

headline.main: Saudi-Led Coalition to Investigate Bombing of Clinic in Yemen
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Saudis to Investigate Clinic Raid
